attributes.action: Keep fuel price at the pumps in line with the actual price of a barrel of crude oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the cost of a barrel of oil is now down to $80, as at 10/10/08, the price of fuel is still mucher higher than before the recent rise, which hit £1.20 per litre.

As the cost has come down from $150/barrel to almost half why has the price at the pumps not followed suit?

I therefore request that the price at the pump fluctuates with the price of a barrel

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
